name: @hydecorp/drawer
description: A touch-enabled drawer component for the modern web

scripts.copy: mkdir -p lib && find src -name '*.js' -exec cp {} lib \;
scripts.build: npm run copy && (npm run build:tsc & npm run build:rollup) & wait
scripts.watch: npm run copy && (npm run watch:tsc & npm run watch:rollup)
scripts.postversion: sed -i '' -E 's:^#<removed temporarily>(lib|docs/assets/hy-\*)$:\1:' .gitignore && git rm --cached -r lib docs/assets/hy-* && git add . && git commit -m 'Restore preversion .gitignore'

author: Florian Klampfer <mail@qwtel.com> (https://qwtel.com/)
